verses.name: Jeremiah 14:19
verses.text: Hast thou utterly rejected Judah? hath thy soul lothed Zion? why hast thou smitten us, and there is no healing for us? we looked for peace, and there is no good; and for the time of healing, and behold trouble!

verses.name: Jeremiah 14:20
verses.text: We acknowledge, O Lord, our wickedness, and the iniquity of our fathers: for we have sinned against thee.

verses.name: Jeremiah 14:21
verses.text: Do not abhor us, for thy name’s sake, do not disgrace the throne of thy glory: remember, break not thy covenant with us.
